TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: Sherlock Holmes is just a cheap pulp fiction about the cheating character who solves the crimes only because the author never lists all available details, but adds them in the final scene to let Sherlock look smarter than the reader.

Science is just tasting stuff with your eyes and writing your feelings down.

From my friend: "Fortnite "gamers" are 12 year olds (or people who act like one), insanely high on apple juice and/or donut."

Edited October 5, 2021 by AtomicTech

It's one small step for man, and then a step to the right, with your hands on your hips, you bend your knees in time, but it's the pelvic thrust, that really drives you insane, let's do the moon walk again. You get all that Houston?

The DreamSMP is all a sham to get famous youtubers to play a minecraft server that has no worth and one person will always start a war that usually results in a mega battle youtube 2 part event and ends up on the fandom as a well elaborated but still dumb history topic.
Petato
Something I really believe, Stargate is better than Star Trek,
Quark was better than any show that had "Star" in it.

Farscape should end with their boat disintegration, as it was primarily done; without the additional season, added to calm the momma's kids by sweet happy end.

Four legs.

Spoiler

In the Game of Thrones the dragons had two legs and two wings.

But the jewellery were depicting them four-legged, as in early design.

The prequel/sidequel/franchisequel which is now being filmed, intensively uses four-legged dragon images.

Potentially, it's a holywar about which variant is a stupid heresy.

I bet those dwarfs really hate smudge the dragon.
